    Event management services

    MySpotBook increases your efficiency saving your time managing reservations with your costumers âˆ’ Whether you are a big company, a regular organizer or a casual planner.

    Start & grow

    • Start
    • Manage
    • Grow

    Quick setup

    Easy build up your events at MySpotBook admin and put down the information you want to transfer to your customers: Location, Time, Spots, Contact info, price, etc... As custom as it is.

    Branding & Integrate

    MySpotBook generates a widget for you to use to merge with your website, which builds up your brand so efficiently.

    Social Media Sharing

    No website? Don't worry. MySpotBook offers you a link to share with your customers on social media. Your customers can reserve and follow up the schedule with just one click.

    Fast reserve

    Your customers can reserve events through your schedule showcase, smooth and efficient process save up your time.

    Real-time updates

    Stay updated with what's going on with real-time analysis and updates of your events.

    Engagement

    Send a single message and approach each one of your community members individually.

    Confirmation

    Free yourself from sending messages one on one to your customers asking "Will you appear?". We automate this process within one click. You will see your customers confirmations on MySpotBook admin.

    Summary dashboard

    Know how your events perform over time, whether it's worth repeating certain events, or switch to new ones.

    Analysis and Tracking

    Analyze data from your user behaviours to create bonds with them and keep them engaged to your community events.
